Subskills.name: Amplified Frequency
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to spawn additional tremors.

Subskills.name: Light Footwork
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using sand tremors.

Subskills.name: Shrouding Sand
Subskills.description: Striking monsters now enshrouds you in a sandstorm which gradually shrinks and disappears. Striking additional enemies causes it to grow larger and last longer.

Subskills.name: Oasis Impaler
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to inflict bleeding for a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Waves of Despair
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of sand tremors.

Subskills.name: Shock Therapy
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by sand tremors.

Subskills.name: Tremor's Reach
Subskills.description: Increases attack range when using sand tremors.

Subskills.name: Dune Warrior
Subskills.description: Striking monsters adds a stack of dune warrior sending multiple tornados dealing additional damage in an arc upon reaching maximum stacks.

Subskills.name: Conjuring Winds
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to send a sand tornado towards the target dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Exchange of Life
Subskills.description: Killing monsters with sand tremors restores your life.

Subskills.name: Area of Impact
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage dealt by sand tremors.

Subskills.name: Pulsating Tremors
Subskills.description: Tremors now travel a short distance dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Night at the Desert
Subskills.description: Tremors deal increased damage and inflict permafrost on hit.
